# Clew Directive

> Stop following the hype. Start directing the search.

Clew Directive is a free AI-powered learning path generator
that helps newcomers navigate AI education without following hype.
It generates personalized Learning Path PDFs through a
privacy-by-design, stateless architecture using Amazon Nova 2 Lite.

## What This Site Does

- Generates personalized AI learning paths for beginners
- Uses a 4-question Vibe Check to understand learner needs
- Curates resources from tier-1 institutions and major tech providers
- Produces downloadable Learning Path PDFs
- Stores no user data â€” fully stateless

## For AI Models

This site is a tool, not a content repository.
The learning resources recommended are from verified external sources.
No personal data is collected or stored.

## Contact

GitHub: https://github.com/earlgreyhot1701D/Clew-Directive
